title: Google\Cloud\Translate\V3\SupportedLanguage
name: SupportedLanguage
description:
A single supported language response corresponds to information related to one supported language.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.translation.v3.SupportedLanguage

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: Supported language code, generally consisting of its ISO 639-1 identifier, for example, 'en', 'ja'. In certain cases, BCP-47 codes including language and region identifiers are returned (for example, 'zh-TW' and 'zh-CN')

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Human readable name of the language localized in the display language specified in the request.

methods.description:
